forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 53 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a canopy of mostly sunny skies, with a promise of mildness that beckons exploration. As the sun climbs higher, temperatures hover around a comfortable 56 degrees, gradually easing towards the chilly embrace of afternoon with a slight dip. A gentle north-northwest breeze whispers through the streets, soothing yet invigorating, conversing softly with the remnants of the morning mist that lingers along the horizon.

Tonight, the moon will peek through a veil of partly cloudy skies, settling into a cooler ambiance around 47 degrees, perfect for a cozy evening stroll or a warm cup of tea at your favorite café. As you step outside, consider a light jacket, perhaps a soft scarf, to ward off the nip in the air while you take in the nightlife of the city—a leisurely walk through the Golden Gate Park might be a delightful choice, or perhaps a visit to a local bookstore, where the smell of old pages mingles with fresh coffee, inviting contemplation and warmth.
